snippet: KASPER--Anne, 1917-2015. Beloved wife and mother. Widow of Irving Kasper, mother of Marvin, Orlando, FL and Carol R. Hannan of Pasadena CA. Interment, Cedar Park. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KASPER--Anne, 1917-2015. Beloved wife and mother. Widow of Irving Kasper, mother of Marvin, Orlando, FL and Carol R. Hannan of Pasadena CA. Interment, Cedar Park. 1/3
